title: Himi 205
lyrics:
M.L.
1.
Sīsū ko e ‘Afiona,
Ko e fu’u Makatuliki,
Ko e fakataha’anga,
‘O ho siasi totonu.
2.
Ke ke tauhi kimautolu,
‘I ho Laumālie lelei;
Ke mau fai ‘o loto taha,
Hangē ko ho finangalo.
3.
Pea mau mo’ui foki,
‘I he Laumālie lelei;
‘I he ‘aho kotoa pē,
‘O taau mo e kakai tui.
4.
Ke mau tu’u ‘i ho siasi,
Ko e kau faka’ilonga;
‘I he fe’ofo’ofani
Mo e anga fakalotu.
5.
Ke mau hokohoko ma’u pē
‘Eiki, mei ho fu’u fonu,
‘A e kelesi tokoni,
‘I he ‘aho kotoa pē.
6.
Ke ‘oua ke mau hokosi,
‘A e anga ‘a e ‘Eiki,
Pea ma’u, homau kāinga,
Kuo ‘alu ki he langi. *
